REF     : MA-EM-2024-08-28-001
ATTN    : CHARTERING DESK
GOOD DAY,
DEAR ALL / AMIN
KINDLY PPS SUITABLE VESSEL’S FOR FOLLOWING FIRM
1)
abt 25.000m tons bagged rice 25/50 sf abt 46
Loading fm hcm – Vietnam
2 dischg  intention  Nacala +Beira
Load rate 1500 -Dischg 1500 sat noon
Lyacan spot
3.75%IAC
2)
28000 10 pct moloo – bagged rice 25/50 sf abt 46
Bin Qasim for 2 ports west Africa intention Cotonou , Lome
Load 3000 – dischg 1200 Saturday 12 till Monday 0800 Eiu both ends
Laycan 10-15 sept 2024
3.75%IAC
Pls offer bais  free d/a at disch ports
3)
Ochamchire 6.6m draft /Beira
8000t-10000mt AN in bb (IMO 5.1 / UN2067) 1,1x1,1x1,1m/1t max 6 tier
10/15 Sept
1500x/1500x
2.5%
4)
5000 MT Guar Meal as Part or sole cargo
Conakry / Brake
1000 MT SHINC / 1500 MT SHINC
Laycan Spot onwards
3.75%IAc
5)
5000-7000 cement in bulk
Egypt med-libya
1500-1000
Vsl dates
2.5%
6)
5000 mts Urea in Big Bags 0.82*0.82*1.6 m / 6 tiers
Trabzon/Orlivka
1000/1000
Lc 03.09-04.09.24
2.5%
7)
3600-3700 mts Corn SF 52 WOG
Chornomorsk / ECG or Creete chopt
1500/1500
Lc SPOT
2.5%
8)
7000 mts Rye SF 50-52 WOG
Chornomorsk / Spanmed
2000/1500
Lc 01.09-05.09
2.5%
MAX 30 y.o. candidate

RGDS /  AMIN
SARTAN SHIPPING & TRADING
